text: The cricket teams of Bangladesh and West Indies have played against each other in ODIs since 2003. They have met on 14 occasions. West Indies is most successful with 13 victories, Bangladesh have won in only 1 game. ==Summary of results== Total Won by Bangladesh Won by West Indies Tie/NR In Bangladesh 14 4 9 1 In West Indies 7 3 4 0 In Neutral Venue 4 0 3 1 Total 25 7 16 2 == Related pages == *Bangladesh national cricket team *West Indies national cricket team == References == == Other websites == *ESPNcricinfo Category:Lists of international cricket matches Category:Bangladeshi cricket lists
title:
List of One Day International cricket matches played by Bangladesh and West
Indies
